person.persName: Napoleon B. Stephens (Kenton Circuit Court Clerk )

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky circuit court clerk. Kentucky native. Married Rebecca Stephens. Father of Mary Stephens, Statira Stephens, John Stephens, and Rachel Stephens. Held one slave in 1860. Kenton Circuit Court Clerk from at least 1860 to 1861.
